FuncDef: This command specifies the protect path for a GMPLS LSP. At least one protect path must be specified if a GMPLS LSP uses 1-to-N end-to-end protection. Thepath-nameparameter must correspond to a path defined underconfig>router>gmpls>path.

ParaDef.Info: The name of the path used by the protect path. Values-32 characters maximum text string.
